Data
```{r}
library(readr)
library(ggplot2)
library(plotly)
adae <- read_csv("https://rhoinc.github.io/data-library/data/clinical-trials/adam/adae.csv")
```

Data Viz
```{r}
View(adae)
```

Plotly
```{r}
#seemas plotly
p <-ggplot(adae) +
  aes(x = AESEV, fill = SEX) +
  geom_bar() +
  scale_fill_hue(direction = 1) +
  theme_minimal()

ggplotly(p)

```
